actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1407(h) of title 28, United States Code, to permit the consolidation of antitrust actions for trial.

summary.text: Amends the judicial code to authorize the judicial panel on multidistrict litigation to consolidate any action brought under the Clayton Act for both pretrial and trial proceedings in a single district court.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1407(h) of title 28, United States Code, to permit the consolidation of antitrust actions for trial.
